nexusbit.rgb_led_random|block: PCA9685 RGB LED set to random color

nexusbit.servoDeltaFromDefl|block: PCA9685 servo no. %servo move %delta degree(s) from default
nexusbit.servoIsDeltaFromDefl|block: PCA9685 servo no. %servo at degree(s) %delta from default %check ?

nexusbit.servoSlowTurnDeltaFromDefl|bloc: PCA9685 servo no. %servo gradually move %delta degree(s) from default
nexusbit.servoSlowTurnMinMax|block: PCA9685 servo no. %servo gradually turn toward %direction degree(s)
nexusbit.servoSlowTurn|block: PCA9685 servo no. %servo gradually turn toward %degree degree(s)
nexusbit.servoToMinMax|block: PCA9685 servo no. %servo turn to %direction degree(s)
nexusbit.servoTo|block: PCA9685 servo no. %servo turn to %degree degree(s)

nexusbit.servosSlowTurnDeltaFromDefl|blo: PCA9685 all servos gradually move|from default by array %deltas|turning delay (ms) = %delay
nexusbit.servosToDefl|block: All PCA9685 servos turn to default
nexusbit.servosToDegree|block: All PCA9685 servos turn to degrees %degree
nexusbit.servosToDeltaFromDefl|block: All PCA9685 servos move to degrees %deltas|from default and wait at end (ms) %delayEnd

nexusbit.stepMotor|block: Stepper motor 1 step|IN1 = %pin1 IN2 = %pin2 IN3 = %pin3 IN4 = %pin4|direction %direction|cycle delay (us) = %delay
